typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		ID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
